page.title: 17BIRTHDAY PARTIES
page.content: We have many{celebrations}during the year - christenings, weddings, Christmas parties and birthday parties. At a{child's birthday party} the child's friends usually come together at his home. The{guests} arrive with presents wrapped in decorated paper. They play{games}such as 'musical chairs', 'musical bumps', 'musical statues' or 'dead lions. The music is played on record or cassette player. After the games and dancing they sit down at a table to eat{food} such as sandwiches, sausage rolls and crisps, followed by something such as ice cream and jelly. Then comes the{ {birthday cake}decorated with icing sugar or cream and lighted candles - one for each year of the birthday person's age and he has to try to blow out all the candles at one attempt.
